framework.meta

Class MetaVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.meta.MetaVariable

  • public class MetaVariable
extends java.lang.Object
    MetaVariables are objects used by MetaConstraintSolvers for backtracking search. They contain ConstraintNetworks representing meta variables for the meta-CSP search. A MetaVariable also has a reference to the MetaConstraint which was used to obtain it. MetaVariables are used internally by the MetaConstraintSolver and should not be instantiated explicitly (hence the constructors are not accessible outside this package).
    Author:
    Federico Pecora
